mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owner (OW_NO, OW_NAME, OW_TOTHORSES, OW_CANCLEDHORSES, OW_NOWHORSES, OW_STDATE, OW_RCCNTY, OW_CHAKSUNY,OW_RCCNTT, OW_CHAKSUNT,OW_MEET) VALUES (#{ow_no},#{ow_name},#{ow_totHorses},#{ow_cancledHorses},#{ow_nowHorses},#{ow_stDate},#{ow_rcCntY},#{ow_chaksunY},#{ow_rcCntT},#{ow_chaksunT},#{ow_meet})
